rdfs:label: Technical Measure
dct:description: Technical measures required/followed when processing data of the declared category
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Pseudonymisation and Encryption
dct:description: Category of technical measures consisting of pseudoanonymization and encryption
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Encryption in Rest
dct:description: Encryption of data when being stored (persistent encryption)
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Encryption in Transfer
dct:description: Encryption of data in transit e.g. when being transferred from one location to another, including sharing
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Pseudo-Anonymization
dct:description: PseudoAnonmyization or 'pseudonymisationâ€™ means the processing of personal data in such a manner that the personal data can no longer be attributed to a specific data subject without the use of additional information, provided that such additional information is kept separately and is subject to technical and organisational measures to ensure that the personal data are not attributed to an identified or identifiable natural person;
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: De-Identification
dct:description: Process by identifiable personal data (PII) is converted to un-identifiable personal data
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Anonymization
dct:description: process by which personal data is irreversibly altered in such a way that a data subject can no longer be identified directly or indirectly, either by the data controller alone or in collaboration with any other party
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Access Control Method
dct:description: methods which restrict access to a place or resource
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Authentication Protocols
dct:description: protocols involving validation of identity i.e. authentication of a person or information
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Storage Restriction
dct:description: Restrictions required or followed regarding storage of data
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Storage Duration
dct:description: A duration or temporal entity denoting limitation on storage of personal data
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Storage Location
dct:description: Defines a location or goespatial scope, where the data is (physically) stored
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Storage Deletion
dct:description: Defines how secure deletion is guaranteed
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Storage Restoration
dct:description: Regularity and temporal span of data restoration/backup mechanisms that guarantee that data is preserved
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Organisational Measure
dct:description: Organisational measures required/followed when processing data of the declared category
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Authorisation Procedure
dct:description: Specifies procedures for determining permission or authority
rdfs:comment: non-technical authorisation procedures: How is it described on an organisational level, who gets access to the data
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Legal Agreement
dct:description: A legally binding agreement
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: NDA
dct:description: Non-disclosure Agreements e.g. preserving confidentiality of information
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Contract
dct:description: Contractual terms governing data handling within the data controller
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: GuidelinesPrinciple
dct:description: Guidelines or Principles regarding processing and operational measures
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Code of Conduct
dct:description: A set of rules or procedures outlining the norms and practices for conducting activities
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Design Standard
dct:description: A set of rules or guidelines outlining criterias for design
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Privacy by Default
dct:description: Practices regarding selecting appropriate data protection and privacy measures as the 'default' in an activity or service
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Risk Management Procedure
dct:description: Risk management refers to a coordinated set of activities and methods that is used to direct an organization and to control the many risks that can affect its ability to achieve objectives.  The term risk management also refers to the programme that is used to manage risk. This programme includes risk management principles, a risk management framework, and a risk management process.
rdfs:comment: Data Protection Impact Assessments as per GDPR art 35, other Privacy Impact Assessments, threat severity assessment https://www.cnil.fr/en/privacy-impact-assessment-pia
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Privacy by Design
dct:description: Practices regarding incorporating data protection and privacy in the design of information and services
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Regularity of Re-certification
dct:description: Specifies policy regarding repetition or renewal of existing certification(s)
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Staff Training
dct:description: Practices and policies regarding training of staff members
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Certification and Seal
dct:description: Category of certifications, seals, and marks indicating compliance to regulations or practices
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Certification
dct:description: certification mechanisms, seals, and marks for the purpose of demonstrating compliance
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar

rdfs:label: Seal
dct:description: a seal or a mark indicating proof of certification to some certification or standard
dct:creator: Axel Polleres, Rob Brennan, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar
